item.description:
I was given this information by a member and though I can not make it, I thought I'd post it for him. I'm sorry it is at such short notice but I just got back from vacation myself.


Tequila Dinner. Check out the menu for the event.

Chilled Connecticut Blue Point Oysters
Three pepper Patron Silver bloody mary sauce
Sparkling Citronage Cocktail
Three Cheese Chili Relleno with Grilled Gulf Shrimp Tomato
Cilantro Sauce
Arroz Amarillo, tomatillo-chipotle salsa
Watermelon Margarita
Red Chili Braised Murray’s Chicken
Yukon gold potatoes, citrus, sautéed greens
Patron Sangrita Tini
Patron Café Sundae
Café caramel sauce, vanilla gelato, crisp tortilla
Patron XO Café

$40 per person

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Tequila Dinner
